column1: Tol Fuin was an island off the coast of Forlindon.
When the waves consumed Beleriand and the regions around it after the War of Wrath
column2: not all of the western lands were lost. The highlands that had been Dorthonion
column3: and came to be called Taur-nu-Fuin (Dorthonion)
column4: in part survived the inrush of the sea
column5: and remained as an island far off the western coasts of Forlindon.

column1: From Sindarin for Dark Isle from tol and fuin.
